content.heroIntro: AM HOME NAUFRAGOS represents a remarkable opportunity to own a contemporary apartment in one of Spain's most desirable coastal destinations. Located in the vibrant Playa Los Naufragos area of Torrevieja, Alicante, this development offers 1-bedroom apartments starting from just €168,000, making luxury beachside living accessible to savvy buyers and investors alike. With scheduled completion on March 1st, 2026, AM HOME delivers quality construction with modern finishes, private amenities, and proximity to pristine beaches, excellent healthcare facilities, and a thriving expat community. Whether you're seeking a holiday retreat, investment property, or permanent Mediterranean residence, AM HOME NAUFRAGOS combines affordability with location advantages that have driven property values up 8% year-on-year across Torrevieja. The development is positioned 45% below comparable Costa Blanca North prices, offering exceptional value without compromising on quality, amenities, or lifestyle.

locationSection.intro: Playa Los Naufragos is a sought-after residential enclave in Torrevieja, blending authentic Mediterranean charm with modern convenience. This thriving coastal area attracts families, retirees, and international investors who value the balance between beach culture and urban accessibility. The neighborhood benefits from the region's most extensive expat community in Spain, where English is widely spoken and international services cater to diverse populations. Torrevieja's transformation from fishing village to cosmopolitan hub has created a dynamic environment with contemporary shopping centers, world-class healthcare, quality restaurants, and recreational opportunities. Playa Los Naufragos specifically offers easy access to the stunning Playa del Cura, awarded the Blue Flag for environmental and safety standards, while maintaining proximity to the famous salt lakes and natural parks that define the Costa Blanca landscape.
